_comment: Created by EFisher on 25/02/2014 18:20:52 using v2.0
title: How have inpatients' experiences changed over time?
analysis_commentary: This indicator suggests that patients in England had a positive experience of outpatient care in 2012/13, score of 76.5 out of 100 (where 0 is the worst score and 100 is the best score), which has been relatively consistent over time since 2003/04.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Outcomes Framework Indicator Portal
